name: Main Virtual Office
overview:
Main Virtual Office combines professional phone answering with a mobile app that allows messages to be viewed and managed much like email.

According to a Fortune 2006 study, more than 80% of callers hang up when they are sent to voice mail. This has tremendous repercussions for small businesses using voice mail. Imagine if one or two new jobs or customers where in that 80%?

The Main Virtual Office mobile app for Android and iOS represents how todays cloud and mobile based technology is changing the way small business operates. We are using a scalable cloud based system that allows our receptionists to immediately access a tremendous amount of information about a company when a call comes in for them so it seems like we are right in that companies office office when we answer the phone for them. We have combined this with a mobile app that allows messages to be viewed and managed much like email.
